Title: Break the String
Writer: Jenji Kohan (created by), Kirsa Rein, Anthony Natoli (story editor), Merritt Tierce (staff writer)
Actors: Taylor Schilling, Natasha Lyonne, Uzo Aduba, Danielle Brooks
Plot: While Daddy buys time with Barb; Daya looks for new ways to bring in oxy. Black Cindy's guilt takes a toll on her body. Red acquires a powerful ally.
